snippet: The extension of the No. 7 subway line and rezoning are transforming the Hudson Yards area into a thriving residential and commercial district.
abstract: Development in New York City's Hudson Yards is booming after a rezoning to accommodate residential and office properties transformed the area in 2005.
lead_paragraph: The extension of the No. 7 subway line and rezoning are transforming the Hudson Yards area into a thriving residential and commercial district.

headline.seo: Development Flourishes in Manhattan’s Hudson Yards District
headline.main: Development Thrives in the Hudson Rail Yards
headline.print_headline: Development Thrives in the Hudson Rail Yards
